content.query:
IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'synapse-analytics-course-cosmos-db'))
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [synapse-analytics-course-cosmos-db]
    WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = '2f31RU0og4eBswGUtyjye8J2cmRq3lwfMPzdZ53uxeuuok1PnOc9sDNcourjGHJ3nAyRoVj4AqZxPvX98Tvgrg=='
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=synapse-analytics-course-cosmos-db;Database=nyctaxidb',
                OBJECT = 'Heartbeat',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'synapse-analytics-course-cosmos-db'
) AS [Heartbeat]
